text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include all codes defined in http://fhir.mimic.mit.edu/CodeSystem/medication-formulary-drug-cd
  • Include all codes defined in http://fhir.mimic.mit.edu/CodeSystem/medication-icu
  • Include all codes defined in http://fhir.mimic.mit.edu/CodeSystem/medication-name
  • Include all codes defined in http://fhir.mimic.mit.edu/CodeSystem/medication-ndc
  • Include all codes defined in http://fhir.mimic.mit.edu/CodeSystem/medication-poe-iv

name: Medication
title: Medication
description: All medication codesystems combined for MIMIC. Contains medication-formulary-drug-cd, medication-ndc, medication-name, medication-poe-iv, medication-icu
